text: Yalla kinni isi naqoosah amol dirkiseh tanim usun kaah aqunxak, Yalla kinni isi naqoosah malaykootay ken taamoomi lowtaah dacrissa Rubtam, siinik numuk teynah Rabi yamaate wagqdi Ni-farmoytiiti (Rooci tayyaaqe malayka kinnuk) Rooci kaak tayyaaqem usun Yalli ken kah amrise caagiidak tubayse kal tuboolayse kal
